name.str_pl: copies of On Unity With Nature

description: This book appears to be made of heavy parchment and bound in animal hide. It claims that man is a part of the natural world, not something set above it. Through magic, it is possible to become even more in tune with life.
This book has an art piece of a peaceful forest pool on the cover. The text is focuses on druidic magic and its place in pre-modern communities as the main source of healthcare.
